title: Flatbreads
directions: Mix all the ingredients together by hand, or use a food processor. Mix until you have a dough. If the consistency is too wet: add extra flour, if too dry: add some water.
Dust your work surface with some flour and knead the dough for a minute.
Roll the pieces out into rounds about the size of a side-plate (or roll them out thinner if you wanna use them as wraps).
Put a griddle pan on a high heat and let it get really hot. Then cook each flatbread for about 2-3 minutes per side, or until puffy and somewhat charred.
ingredients: 5 oz. (140 gr) yogurt (I used a thicker variety)
a good sprinkle of sea salt
